price: Dájúdájú òun kì í gbàgbọ́ nínú Allāhu, Atóbi.
arabic: إِنَّهُۥ كَانَ لَا يُؤۡمِنُ بِٱللَّهِ ٱلۡعَظِيمِ

version.title: Yoruba translation
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Yoruba by Abu Rahima Mikhail Aikweiny, printed in 1432 H.

meta.transliteration: innahu kāna lā yu'minu bil-lahi al-ʿaẓīmi
